alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 9:16PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Delaware County through 945 PM EST... At 916 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colchester, or near Walton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walton, Delhi, Colchester, Hamden, Andes, Margaretville, Arkville, Bovina Center, Dunraven and Wolf Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
